tool.name: stress-ng
tool.description: stress test a computer system in various selectable ways

param.label: abort
param.help: abort all stressors if any stressor fails

param.label: aggressive
param.help: enable all aggressive options

param.label: all
param.help: start N workers of each stress test

param.label: backoff
param.help: wait of N microseconds before work starts

param.label: class name
param.help: specify a class of stressors, use with --sequential

param.label: dry-run
param.help: do not run

param.label: ignite cpu
param.help: alter kernel controls to make CPU run hot

param.label: ionice class C
param.help: specify ionice class (idle, besteffort, realtime)

param.label: ionice level L
param.help: specify ionice level (0 max, 7 min)

param.label: job file
param.help: run the named jobfile

param.label: keep name
param.help: keep stress worker names to be 'stress-ng'

param.label: log brief
param.help: less verbose log messages

param.label: log file
param.help: messages to a log file

param.label: maximize
param.help: enable maximum stress options

param.label: max fd
param.help: set maximum file descriptor limit

param.label: metrics
param.help: print pseudo metrics of activity

param.label: metrics brief
param.help: enable metrics and only show non-zero results

param.label: minimize
param.help: enable minimal stress options

param.label: no madvise
param.help: don't use random madvise options for each mmap

param.label: no rand seed
param.help: seed random numbers with the same constant

param.label: page in
param.help: touch allocated pages that are not in core

param.label: pathological
param.help: enable stressors that are known to hang a machine

param.label: perf
param.help: display perf statistics

param.label: quiet
param.help: quiet output

param.label: random N
param.help: start N random workers

param.label: sched type
param.help: set scheduler type

param.label: sched prio N
param.help: set scheduler priority level N

param.label: sched period N
param.help: set period for SCHED_DEADLINE to N nanosecs

param.label: sched runtime N
param.help: set runtime for SCHED_DEADLINE to N nanosecs

param.label: sched deadline N
param.help: set deadline for SCHED_DEADLINE to N nanosecs

param.label: sched reclaim
param.help: set reclaim cpu bandwidth for deadline scheduler

param.label: sequential N
param.help: run all stressors one by one, invoking N of them

param.label: stressors
param.help: show available stress tests

param.label: syslog
param.help: log messages to the syslog

param.label: taskset
param.help: use specific CPUs (set CPU affinity)

param.label: thrash
param.help: force all pages in causing swap thrashing

param.label: timeout T
param.help: timeout after T seconds

param.label: timer slack
param.help: enable timer slack mode

param.label: times
param.help: show run time summary at end of the run

param.label: timestamp
param.help: timestamp log output

param.label: tz
param.help: collect temperatures from thermal zones (Linux only)

param.label: verbose
param.help: verbose output

param.label: verify
param.help: verify results (not available on all tests)

param.label: version
param.help: show version

param.label: exclude
param.help: list of stressors to exclude (not run)

param.label: access N
param.help: start N workers that stress file access permissions

param.label: access ops N
param.help: stop after N file access bogo operations

param.label: af alg N
param.help: start N workers that stress AF_ALG socket domain

param.label: af alg ops N
param.help: stop after N af-alg bogo operations

param.label: af alg dump
param.help: dump internal list from /proc/crypto to stdout

param.label: affinity N
param.help: start N workers that rapidly change CPU affinity

param.label: affinity ops N
param.help: stop after N affinity bogo operations

param.label: affinity rand
param.help: change affinity randomly rather than sequentially

param.label: aio N
param.help: start N workers that issue async I/O requests

param.label: aio ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo async I/O requests

param.label: aio requests N
param.help: number of async I/O requests per worker

param.label: aiol N
param.help: start N workers that exercise Linux async I/O

param.label: aiol ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo Linux aio async I/O requests

param.label: aiol requests N
param.help: number of Linux aio async I/O requests per worker

param.label: apparmor
param.help: start N workers exercising AppArmor interfaces

param.label: apparmor ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo AppArmor worker bogo operations

param.label: atomic
param.help: start N workers exercising GCC atomic operations

param.label: atomic ops
param.help: stop after N bogo atomic bogo operations

param.label: bad altstack N
param.help: start N workers exercising bad signal stacks

param.label: bad altstack ops N
param.help: after N bogo signal stack SIGSEGVs

param.label: bad ioctl N
param.help: start N stressors that perform illegal read ioctls on devices

param.label: bad ioctl ops
param.help: stop after N bad ioctl bogo operations

param.label: bigheap N
param.help: start N workers that grow the heap using calloc()

param.label: bigheap ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo bigheap operations

param.label: bigheap growth N
param.help: grow heap by N bytes per iteration

param.label: bind mount N
param.help: start N workers exercising bind mounts

param.label: bind mount ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo bind mount operations

param.label: binderfs N
param.help: start N workers exercising binderfs

param.label: binderfs ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo binderfs operations

param.label: branch N
param.help: start N workers that force branch misprediction

param.label: branch ops N
param.help: stop after N branch misprediction branches

param.label: brk N
param.help: start N workers performing rapid brk calls

param.label: brk ops N
param.help: stop after N brk bogo operations

param.label: brk mlock
param.help: attempt to mlock newly mapped brk pages

param.label: brk notouch
param.help: don't touch (page in) new data segment page

param.label: bsearch N
param.help: start N workers that exercise a binary search

param.label: bsearch ops N
param.help: stop after N binary search bogo operations

param.label: bsearch size N
param.help: number of 32 bit integers to bsearch

param.label: cache N
param.help: start N CPU cache thrashing workers

param.label: cache ops N
param.help: stop after N cache bogo operations

param.label: cache prefetch
param.help: prefetch on memory reads/writes

param.label: cache flush
param.help: flush cache after every memory write (x86 only)

param.label: cache fence
param.help: serialize stores

param.label: cache level N
param.help: only exercise specified cache

param.label: cache ways N
param.help: only fill specified number of cache ways

param.label: cap N
param.help: start N workers exercising capget

param.label: cap ops N
param.help: stop cap workers after N bogo capget operations

param.label: chattr N
param.help: start N workers thrashing chattr file mode bits

param.label: chattr ops N
param.help: stop chattr workers after N bogo operations

param.label: chdir N
param.help: start N workers thrashing chdir on many paths

param.label: chdir ops N
param.help: stop chdir workers after N bogo chdir operations

param.label: chdir dirs N
param.help: select number of directories to exercise chdir on

param.label: chmod N
param.help: start N workers thrashing chmod file mode bits

param.label: chmod ops N
param.help: stop chmod workers after N bogo operations

param.label: chown N
param.help: start N workers thrashing chown file ownership

param.label: chown ops N
param.help: stop chown workers after N bogo operations

param.label: chroot N
param.help: start N workers thrashing chroot

param.label: chroot ops N
param.help: stop chhroot workers after N bogo operations

param.label: clock N
param.help: start N workers thrashing clocks and POSIX timers

param.label: clock ops N
param.help: stop clock workers after N bogo operations

param.label: clone N
param.help: start N workers that rapidly create and reap clones

param.label: clone ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo clone operations

param.label: clone max N
param.help: set upper limit of N clones per worker

param.label: close N
param.help: start N workers that exercise races on close

param.label: close ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo close operations

param.label: context N
param.help: start N workers exercising user context

param.label: context ops N
param.help: stop context workers after N bogo operations

param.label: copy file N
param.help: start N workers that copy file data

param.label: copy file ops N
param.help: stop after N copy bogo operations

param.label: copy file bytes N
param.help: size of file to be copied

param.label: cpu N
param.help: start N workers spinning on sqrt(rand())

param.label: cpu ops N
param.help: stop after N cpu bogo operations

param.label: cpu load P
param.help: load CPU by P %, 0=sleep, 100=full load (see -c)

param.label: cpu load slice S
param.help: specify time slice during busy load

param.label: cpu method M
param.help: specify stress cpu method M, default is all

param.label: cpu online N
param.help: start N workers offlining/onlining the CPUs

param.label: cpu online ops N
param.help: stop after N offline/online operations

param.label: crypt N
param.help: start N workers performing password encryption

param.label: crypt ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo crypt operations

param.label: cyclic N
param.help: start N cyclic real time benchmark stressors

param.label: cyclic ops N
param.help: stop after N cyclic timing cycles

param.label: cyclic method M
param.help: specify cyclic method M, default is clock_ns

param.label: cyclic dist N
param.help: calculate distribution of interval N nanosecs

param.label: cyclic policy P
param.help: used rr or fifo scheduling policy

param.label: cyclic prio N
param.help: real time scheduling priority 1..100

param.label: cyclic sleep N
param.help: sleep time of real time timer in nanosecs

param.label: daemon N
param.help: start N workers creating multiple daemons

param.label: daemon ops N
param.help: stop when N daemons have been created

param.label: dccp N
param.help: start N workers exercising network DCCP I/O

param.label: dccp domain D
param.help: specify DCCP domain, default is ipv4

param.label: dccp ops N
param.help: stop after N DCCP bogo operations

param.label: dccp opts option
param.help: DCCP data send options [send|sendmsg|sendmmsg]

param.label: dccp port P
param.help: use DCCP ports P to P + number of workers - 1

param.label: dentry N
param.help: start N dentry thrashing stressors

param.label: dentry ops N
param.help: stop after N dentry bogo operations

param.label: dentry order O
param.help: specify unlink order (reverse, forward, stride)

param.label: dentries N
param.help: create N dentries per iteration

param.label: dev N
param.help: start N device entry thrashing stressors

param.label: dev ops N
param.help: stop after N device thrashing bogo ops

param.label: dev shm N
param.help: start N /dev/shm file and mmap stressors

param.label: dev shm ops N
param.help: stop after N /dev/shm bogo ops

param.label: dir N
param.help: start N directory thrashing stressors

param.label: dir ops N
param.help: stop after N directory bogo operations

param.label: dir dirs N
param.help: select number of directories to exercise dir on

param.label: dirdeep N
param.help: start N directory depth stressors

param.label: dirdeep ops N
param.help: stop after N directory depth bogo operations

param.label: dirdeep dirs N
param.help: create N directories per level

param.label: dirdeep inodes N
param.help: create a maximum N inodes (N can also be %)

param.label: dnotify N
param.help: start N workers exercising dnotify events

param.label: dnotify ops N
param.help: stop dnotify workers after N bogo operations

param.label: dup N
param.help: start N workers exercising dup/close

param.label: dup ops N
param.help: stop after N dup/close bogo operations

param.label: dynlib N
param.help: start N workers exercising dlopen/dlclose

param.label: dynlib ops N
param.help: stop after N dlopen/dlclose bogo operations

param.label: efivar N
param.help: start N workers that read EFI variables

param.label: efivar ops N
param.help: stop after N EFI variable bogo read operations

param.label: enosys N
param.help: start N workers that call non-existent system calls

param.label: enosys ops N
param.help: stop after N enosys bogo operations

param.label: env N
param.help: start N workers setting environment vars

param.label: env ops N
param.help: stop after N env bogo operations

param.label: epoll N
param.help: start N workers doing epoll handled socket activity

param.label: epoll ops N
param.help: stop after N epoll bogo operations

param.label: epoll port P
param.help: use socket ports P upwards

param.label: epoll domain D
param.help: specify socket domain, default is unix

param.label: eventfd N
param.help: start N workers stressing eventfd read/writes

param.label: eventfd ops N
param.help: stop eventfd workers after N bogo operations

param.label: eventfs nonblock
param.help: poll with non-blocking I/O on eventfd fd

param.label: exec N
param.help: start N workers spinning on fork() and exec()

param.label: exec ops N
param.help: stop after N exec bogo operations

param.label: exec max P
param.help: create P workers per iteration, default is 1

param.label: fallocate N
param.help: start N workers fallocating 16MB files

param.label: fallocate ops N
param.help: stop after N fallocate bogo operations

param.label: fallocate bytes N
param.help: size of file to allocate

param.label: fanotify N
param.help: start N workers exercising fanotify events

param.label: fanotify ops N
param.help: stop fanotify workers after N bogo operations

param.label: fault N
param.help: start N workers producing page faults

param.label: fault ops N
param.help: stop after N page fault bogo operations

param.label: fcntl N
param.help: start N workers exercising fcntl commands

param.label: fcntl ops N
param.help: stop after N fcntl bogo operations

param.label: fiemap N
param.help: start N workers exercising the FIEMAP ioctl

param.label: fiemap ops N
param.help: stop after N FIEMAP ioctl bogo operations

param.label: fiemap bytes N
param.help: specify size of file to fiemap

param.label: fifo N
param.help: start N workers exercising fifo I/O

param.label: fifo ops N
param.help: stop after N fifo bogo operations

param.label: fifo readers N
param.help: number of fifo reader stessors to start

param.label: file ioctl N
param.help: start N workers exercising file specific ioctls

param.label: file ioctl ops N
param.help: stop after N file ioctl bogo operations

param.label: filename N
param.help: start N workers exercising filenames

param.label: filename ops N
param.help: stop after N filename bogo operations

param.label: filename opts opt
param.help: allowed filename options

param.label: flock N
param.help: start N workers locking a single file

param.label: flock ops N
param.help: stop after N flock bogo operations

param.label: fork N
param.help: start N workers spinning on fork() and exit()

param.label: fork ops N
param.help: stop after N fork bogo operations

param.label: fork max P
param.help: create P workers per iteration, default is 1

param.label: fp error N
param.help: start N workers exercising floating point errors

param.label: fp error ops N
param.help: stop after N fp-error bogo operations

param.label: fstat N
param.help: start N workers exercising fstat on files

param.label: fstat ops N
param.help: stop after N fstat bogo operations

param.label: fstat dir path
param.help: fstat files in the specified directory

param.label: full N
param.help: start N workers exercising /dev/full

param.label: full ops N
param.help: stop after N /dev/full bogo I/O operations

param.label: funccall N
param.help: start N workers exercising 1 to 9 arg functions

param.label: funccall ops N
param.help: stop after N function call bogo operations

param.label: funccall method M
param.help: function call method M

param.label: funcret N
param.help: start N workers exercising function return copying

param.label: funcret ops N
param.help: stop after N function return bogo operations

param.label: funcret method M
param.help: select method of exercising a function return type

param.label: futex N
param.help: start N workers exercising a fast mutex

param.label: futex ops N
param.help: stop after N fast mutex bogo operations

param.label: get N
param.help: start N workers exercising the get*() system calls

param.label: get ops N
param.help: stop after N get bogo operations

param.label: getdent N
param.help: start N workers reading directories using getdents

param.label: getdent ops N
param.help: stop after N getdents bogo operations

param.label: getrandom N
param.help: start N workers fetching random data via getrandom()

param.label: getrandom ops N
param.help: stop after N getrandom bogo operations

param.label: handle N
param.help: start N workers exercising name_to_handle_at

param.label: handle ops N
param.help: stop after N handle bogo operations

param.label: hdd N
param.help: start N workers spinning on write()/unlink()

param.label: hdd ops N
param.help: stop after N hdd bogo operations

param.label: hdd bytes N
param.help: write N bytes per hdd worker (default is 1GB)

param.label: hdd opts list
param.help: specify list of various stressor options

param.label: hdd write size N
param.help: set the default write size to N bytes

param.label: heapsort N
param.help: start N workers heap sorting 32 bit random integers

param.label: heapsort ops N
param.help: stop after N heap sort bogo operations

param.label: heapsort size N
param.help: number of 32 bit integers to sort

param.label: hrtimers N
param.help: start N workers that exercise high resolution timers

param.label: hrtimers ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo high-res timer bogo operations

param.label: hsearch N
param.help: start N workers that exercise a hash table search

param.label: hsearch ops N
param.help: stop after N hash search bogo operations

param.label: hsearch size N
param.help: number of integers to insert into hash table

param.label: icache N
param.help: start N CPU instruction cache thrashing workers

param.label: icache ops N
param.help: stop after N icache bogo operations

param.label: icmp flood N
param.help: start N ICMP packet flood workers

param.label: icmp flood ops N
param.help: stop after N ICMP bogo operations (ICMP packets)

param.label: idle page N
param.help: start N idle page scanning workers

param.label: idle page ops N
param.help: stop after N idle page scan bogo operations

param.label: inode flags N
param.help: start N workers exercising various inode flags

param.label: inode flags ops N
param.help: inode-flags workers after N bogo operations

param.label: inotify N
param.help: start N workers exercising inotify events

param.label: inotify ops N
param.help: stop inotify workers after N bogo operations

param.label: io N
param.help: start N workers spinning on sync()

param.label: io ops N
param.help: stop sync I/O after N io bogo operations

param.label: iomix N
param.help: start N workers that have a mix of I/O operations

param.label: iomix bytes N
param.help: write N bytes per iomix worker (default is 1GB)

param.label: iomix ops N
param.help: stop iomix workers after N iomix bogo operations

param.label: ioport N
param.help: start N workers exercising port I/O

param.label: ioport ops N
param.help: stop ioport workers after N port bogo operations

param.label: ioprio N
param.help: start N workers exercising set/get iopriority

param.label: ioprio ops N
param.help: stop after N io bogo iopriority operations

param.label: io uring N
param.help: start N workers that issue io-uring I/O requests

param.label: io uring ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo io-uring I/O requests

param.label: ipsec mb N
param.help: start N workers exercising the IPSec MB encoding

param.label: ipsec mb ops N
param.help: stop after N ipsec bogo encoding operations

param.label: ipsec mb feature F
param.help: specify CPU feature F

param.label: itimer N
param.help: start N workers exercising interval timers

param.label: itimer ops N
param.help: stop after N interval timer bogo operations

param.label: itimer rand
param.help: enable random interval timer frequency

param.label: judy N
param.help: start N workers that exercise a judy array search

param.label: judy ops N
param.help: stop after N judy array search bogo operations

param.label: judy size N
param.help: number of 32 bit integers to insert into judy array

param.label: kcmp N
param.help: start N workers exercising kcmp

param.label: kcmp ops N
param.help: stop after N kcmp bogo operations

param.label: key N
param.help: start N workers exercising key operations

param.label: key ops N
param.help: stop after N key bogo operations

param.label: kill N
param.help: start N workers killing with SIGUSR1

param.label: kill ops N
param.help: stop after N kill bogo operations

param.label: klog N
param.help: start N workers exercising kernel syslog interface

param.label: klog ops N
param.help: stop after N klog bogo operations

param.label: lease N
param.help: start N workers holding and breaking a lease

param.label: lease ops N
param.help: stop after N lease bogo operations

param.label: lease breakers N
param.help: number of lease breaking workers to start

param.label: link N
param.help: start N workers creating hard links

param.label: link ops N
param.help: stop after N link bogo operations

param.label: locka N
param.help: start N workers locking a file via advisory locks

param.label: locka ops N
param.help: stop after N locka bogo operations

param.label: lockbus N
param.help: start N workers locking a memory increment

param.label: lockbus ops N
param.help: stop after N lockbus bogo operations

param.label: lockf N
param.help: start N workers locking a single file via lockf

param.label: lockf ops N
param.help: stop after N lockf bogo operations

param.label: lockf nonblock
param.help: don't block if lock cannot be obtained, re-try

param.label: lockofd N
param.help: start N workers using open file description locking

param.label: lockofd ops N
param.help: stop after N lockofd bogo operations

param.label: longjmp N
param.help: start N workers exercising setjmp/longjmp

param.label: longjmp ops N
param.help: stop after N longjmp bogo operations

param.label: loop N
param.help: start N workers exercising loopback devices

param.label: loop ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo loopback operations

param.label: lsearch N
param.help: start N workers that exercise a linear search

param.label: lsearch ops N
param.help: stop after N linear search bogo operations

param.label: lsearch size N
param.help: number of 32 bit integers to lsearch

param.label: madvise N
param.help: start N workers exercising madvise on memory

param.label: madvise ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo madvise operations

param.label: malloc N
param.help: start N workers exercising malloc/realloc/free

param.label: malloc bytes N
param.help: allocate up to N bytes per allocation

param.label: malloc max N
param.help: keep up to N allocations at a time

param.label: malloc ops N
param.help: stop after N malloc bogo operations

param.label: malloc thresh N
param.help: threshold where malloc uses mmap instead of sbrk

param.label: matrix N
param.help: start N workers exercising matrix operations

param.label: matrix ops N
param.help: stop after N maxtrix bogo operations

param.label: matrix method M
param.help: specify matrix stress method M, default is all

param.label: matrix size N
param.help: specify the size of the N x N matrix

param.label: matrix yx
param.help: matrix operation is y by x instead of x by y

param.label: matrix 3d N
param.help: start N workers exercising 3D matrix operations

param.label: matrix 3d ops N
param.help: stop after N 3D maxtrix bogo operations

param.label: matrix 3d method M
param.help: specify 3D matrix stress method M, default is all

param.label: matrix 3d size N
param.help: specify the size of the N x N x N matrix

param.label: matrix 3d zyx
param.help: matrix operation is z by y by x instead of x by y by z

param.label: mcontend N
param.help: start N workers that produce memory contention

param.label: mcontend ops N
param.help: stop memory contention workers after N bogo-ops

param.label: membarrier N
param.help: start N workers performing membarrier system calls

param.label: membarrier ops N
param.help: stop after N membarrier bogo operations

param.label: memcpy N
param.help: start N workers performing memory copies

param.label: memcpy ops N
param.help: stop after N memcpy bogo operations

param.label: memcpy method M
param.help: set memcpy method (M = all, libc, builtin, naive)

param.label: memfd N
param.help: start N workers allocating memory with memfd_create

param.label: memfd bytes N
param.help: allocate N bytes for each stress iteration

param.label: memfd fds N
param.help: number of memory fds to open per stressors

param.label: memfd ops N
param.help: stop after N memfd bogo operations

param.label: memhotplug N
param.help: start N workers that exercise memory hotplug

param.label: memhotplug ops N
param.help: stop after N memory hotplug operations

param.label: memrate N
param.help: start N workers exercised memory read/writes

param.label: memrate ops N
param.help: stop after N memrate bogo operations

param.label: memrate bytes N
param.help: size of memory buffer being exercised

param.label: memrate rd mbs N
param.help: read rate from buffer in megabytes per second

param.label: memrate wr mbs N
param.help: write rate to buffer in megabytes per second

param.label: memthrash N
param.help: start N workers thrashing a 16MB memory buffer

param.label: memthrash ops N
param.help: stop after N memthrash bogo operations

param.label: memthrash method M
param.help: specify memthrash method M, default is all

param.label: mergesort N
param.help: start N workers merge sorting 32 bit random integers

param.label: mergesort ops N
param.help: stop after N merge sort bogo operations

param.label: mergesort size N
param.help: number of 32 bit integers to sort

param.label: mincore N
param.help: start N workers exercising mincore

param.label: mincore ops N
param.help: stop after N mincore bogo operations

param.label: mincore random
param.help: randomly select pages rather than linear scan

param.label: mknod N
param.help: start N workers that exercise mknod

param.label: mknod ops N
param.help: stop after N mknod bogo operations

param.label: mlock N
param.help: start N workers exercising mlock/munlock

param.label: mlock ops N

param.help: start N workers that unmap their address space

param.label: vm segv ops N
param.help: stop after N vm-segv unmap'd SEGV faults

param.label: vm splice N
param.help: start N workers reading/writing using vmsplice

param.label: vm splice ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo splice operations

param.label: vm splice bytes N
param.help: number of bytes to transfer per vmsplice call

param.label: wait N
param.help: start N workers waiting on child being stop/resumed

param.label: wait ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo wait operations

param.label: watchdog N
param.help: start N workers that exercise /dev/watchdog

param.label: watchdog ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo watchdog operations

param.label: wcs N
param.help: start N workers on lib C wide char string functions

param.label: wcs method func
param.help: specify the wide character string function to stress

param.label: wcs ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo wide character string operations

param.label: x86syscall N
param.help: start N workers exercising functions using syscall

param.label: x86syscall ops N
param.help: stop after N syscall function calls

param.label: x86syscall func F
param.help: use just syscall function F

param.label: xattr N
param.help: start N workers stressing file extended attributes

param.label: xattr ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo xattr operations

param.label: yield N
param.help: start N workers doing sched_yield() calls

param.label: yield ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo yield operations

param.label: zero N
param.help: start N workers reading /dev/zero

param.label: zero ops N
param.help: stop after N /dev/zero bogo read operations

param.label: zlib N
param.help: start N workers compressing data with zlib

param.label: zlib level L
param.help: specify zlib compression level 0=fast, 9=best

param.label: zlib mem level L
param.help: specify zlib compression state memory usage 1=minimum, 9=maximum

param.label: zlib method M
param.help: specify zlib random data generation method M

param.label: zlib ops N
param.help: stop after N zlib bogo compression operations

param.label: zlib strategy S
param.help: specify zlib strategy 0=default, 1=filtered, 2=huffman only, 3=rle, 4=fixed

param.label: zlib stream bytes S
param.help: specify the number of bytes to deflate until the current stream will be closed

param.label: zombie N
param.help: start N workers that rapidly create and reap zombies

param.label: zombie ops N
param.help: stop after N bogo zombie fork operations

param.label: zombie max N
param.help: set upper limit of N zombies per worker

tool.help:
**Stress-NG**
``stress-ng`` was originally intended to make a machine work hard and trip hardware issues such as thermal overruns as well as operating system bugs that only occur when a system is being thrashed hard. Use stress-ng with caution as some of the tests can make a system run hot on poorly designed hardware and also can cause excessive system thrashing which may be difficult to stop.
stress-ng can also measure test throughput rates; this can be useful to observe performance changes across different operating system releases or types of hardware. However, it has never been intended to be used as a precise benchmark test suite, so do NOT use it in this manner.
**Examples**
stressng vm 8 vmbytes 80% -t 1h
run 8 virtual memory stressors that combined use 80% of the available memory for 1 hour. Thus each stressor uses 10% of the available memory.
stressng cpu 4 io 2 vm 1 vmbytes 1G timeout 60s
runs for 60 seconds with 4 cpu stressors, 2 io stressors and 1 vm stressor using 1GB of virtual memory.
stressng iomix 2 iomixbytes 10% -t 10m
runs 2 instances of the mixed I/O stressors using a total of 10% of the available file system spacefor 10 minutes. Each stressor will use 5% of the available file system space.
stressng cyclic 1 cyclicdist 2500 cyclicmethod clock_ns cyclicprio 100 cyclicsleep 10000 hdd 0 -t 1m
measures real time scheduling latencies created by the hdd stressor.This uses the high resolution nanosecond clock to measure latencies during sleeps of 10,000 nanoseconds. At the end of 1minute of stressing, the latency distribution with 2500 ns intervals will be displayed.
NOTE: this must be run with the ``CAP_SYS_NICE`` capability to enable the real time scheduling to get accurate measurements.
stressng cpu 8 cpuops 800000
runs 8 cpu stressors and stops after 800000 bogo operations.
stressng sequential 2 timeout 2m metrics
run 2 simultaneous instances of all the stressors sequentially one by one, each for 2 minutes andsummarise with performance metrics at the end.
stressng cpu 4 cpu-method fft cpu-ops 10000 metricsbrief
run 4 FFT cpu stressors, stop after 10000 bogo operations and produce a summary just for the FFTresults.
stressng cpu -1 cpu-method all t 1h cpuload 90
run cpu stressors on all online CPUs working through all the available CPU stressors for 1 hour, loading the CPUs at 90% load capacity.
stressng cpu 0 cpu-method all t 20m
run cpu stressors on all configured CPUs working through all the available CPU stressors for 20minutes
stressng all 4 timeout 5m
run 4 instances of all the stressors for 5 minutes.
stressng random 64
run 64 stressors that are randomly chosen from all the available stressors.
stressng cpu 64 cpumethod all verify t 10m metricsbrief
run 64 instances of all the different cpu stressors and verify that the computations are correct for 10 minutes with a bogo operations summary at the end.
stressng sequential -1 t 10m
run all the stressors one by one for 10 minutes, with the number of instances of each stressor matching the number of online CPUs.
stressng sequential 8 class io t 5m times
run all the stressors in the io class one by one for 5 minutes each, with 8 instances of each stressor running concurrently and show overall time utilisation statistics at the end of the run.
stressng all -1 maximize aggressive
run all the stressors (1 instance of each per online CPU) simultaneously,maximize the settings(memory sizes, file allocations, etc.) and select the most demanding/aggressive options.
stressng random 32 x numa,hdd,key
run 32 randomly selected stressors and exclude the numa, hdd and key stressors
stressng sequential 4 class vm exclude bigheap,brk,stack
run 4 instances of the VM stressors one after each other, excluding the bigheap, brk and stack stressors
stressng taskset 0,2-3 cpu 3
run 3 instances of the CPU stressor and pin them to CPUs 0, 2 and 3.
